resources.string: To see the welcome slider again, goto Settings -> apps -> welcome slider -> clear data

string-array.name: drawer_description
string-array.item: Speak \'Calculate\' and then any simple mathematical operation you want to perform.
To easily open a specific application from a bunch, use the format \'Open\' + \'Name\'
Message anyone by saying out loud the phrase \'Message\' + \'Name\'
Easier Profile Management using the command \'Profile\' + \'Profile Mode you want to set\'
Search any among the Google, Wikipedia, Youtube or Dictionary easily using the command \'Search\' + \'Google/Wiki/Wikipedia/Dictionary\' (by default Google) + \'anything you want to search\'
Easy turn on/off any of the Wi-Fi, Bluetooth, or any other accessibility options using the command \'Turn\' + \'On/Off\' + \'Option\'
Set Alarm Quickly using the Command \'Alarm\' + \'Time\' + \'AM/PM\'
